The campus safety is 100% effective. Campus Security be everywhere.
The greek life is OK but it can be better.
There are alot of clubs and activities to get involved in on campus.
If you are a Chrisitan, want to put God 1st in your life and be saved, nursing and biology majors.
Ummm im not sure about this.
Overall, the school is great and i love it. Need improvement in some areas but nevertheless, its a good school. Alot of activities, fun, games to get into.
Go swimming. Go to the buc park. Hang out with friends at the mall.
The food is good. Fried chicken day every Wednesday. You have pizza everyday.

The dorms are not what you think but they are OK. You have certain days when opposite sex can come over and you have to leave door open. If caught with someone in your room when not schedule and door is shut u get fine.
They are an excellent school. Very easy but you just have to study and stay focus.
Complete alot of scholarships and make sure you have a tour of the college. Make sure your grades are good and study alot. Come with a mind to succeed and do well.
Charleston Southern University is a very expensive college but its worth every penny. They have an awesome biology program. I really enjoy attending Charleston Southern.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety just read what i said above. i had to leave for safety issues. i dont really care if people rate my comments badly. this is seriously for the people who really want to know what this college is like. Clubs and Activities there are a ton to choose from. but they don't do anything usefull for the most part. it is mostly ra-ra we are happy christians sort of thing. Great for these types of students holigans Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus the ras told my roommate secret places on campus to smoke..... Bang for the buck don't feel special if you get a scholarship. everyone does. you will still pay way to much to go to this supposed christian college. i actually became less of a christian while attending csu. What to do for fun wannamaker park is down the street. and there is a mall about 10 min away. beaches are anywhere from 30-50 min away. isle of palms is the cleanest and best. night life in downtown charleston is scary.
